p.o: all over the doddamn shop, Fatsboy Donati
O Rowan Tree, O Rowan Tree,
O Danny boy, the pipes, the pipes ...
Who, what? Wherefore although the earth be moved.
You drink, drink, drink, nothing but drink all the time and kill yourself – liver, kidneys, all pickled, yes.
And the ulcers, ah, amico mio! The indigestion! Now, you eat – I teach you – you eata pizza, my pizza, eat one, two, eat three!
Why not? Liver an’ all that okay, right as rain eh? – drink till the fuckin’ cows come home!
Eat a pizza, you skinny teuchter man. Always drunk, you die soon – phssst!
Don’t even think about it, sonny
Away, ya pishpot, ya slag, ya grotty ould hoor, ya!
Don’t take no shit from nobody.
